Module.Name: Gadgeteer Joystick
Module.Overview: The Gadgeteer Joystick is an X/Y joystick that can all be depressed like button. The X/Y values will be between 200~700.

Function.Name: left_right_get
Function.Description: This function will return the left/right value as a number between approximately 200 to 700.

Function.Name: up_down_get
Function.Description: This function will return the up/down value as a number between approximately 200 to 700.

Function.Name: is_pressed
Function.Description: This function will *True* if the joystick is depressed; and *False* otherwise.
